session_summary: At 11:22 am on 13 March 2023, Deborah and Jolene caught up after a long time. Deborah shared about starting a yoga class in her neighborhood and the joy it brings her to help others through it. They discussed the importance of support in tough times. Jolene mentioned her struggles in managing Engineering assignments and they decided to talk about time management soon. They agreed to find a suitable time to chat and Deborah assured Jolene of her support. Jolene thanked her and the conversation ended with well wishes.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Hi Jolene! We haven't corresponded for a long time!

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Hey Deb, yeah life can get chaotic. How's it been going lately?

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: So much has been going on lately. I started this yoga class in the neighborhood - it's such a good feeling! Now I get to share the exercise with my neighbors and watch it really transform them.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Congrats. How did you do this?

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a group of women posing for a picture
conversation_turns.text: Thanks! My neighbors were interested in trying yoga, so I hosted a class for them on Friday. It was great to see everyone embrace and enjoy it. Here is our photo together.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: That's cool! What made you want to start teaching it?

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: I find it calming and wanted to share that with others. Giving people peace and awareness brings me so much happiness.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Wow, Deb! It's awesome when we can share something we love and make things better for others.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Teaching it is awesome because it can help others and I've made such great friends through it. It's really nice for building community connections.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: That's really motivating. It's great to have support in tough times.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: It's one of life's best parts, right?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Yeah, having someone to rely on is key in tough times. It really makes a difference in how we handle life. Plus, there's something I wanted to tell you.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: What's up? I'm listening. We'll figure it out.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: I'm having a hard time dealing with my Engineering assignments. It's a lot to manage and I'm struggling to keep up. Can we still talk about time management?

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Sure, Jolene. Let's find a time that works for both of us.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Let's find a time to chat - I'll check my schedule and get back to you.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Take your time, Jolene. We'll work it out. Take care of yourself, OK?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: I'll make sure to take it. See you soon!

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: I'm here for you if you need me. Let's catch up soon.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Have a great day!

Deborah: Deborah starts a neighborhood yoga class and finds joy in seeing its impact on them.
Jolene: Jolene struggles with time management for her projects and studies and seeks help from Deborah.

Deborah: Deborah started a yoga class in the neighborhood to share the exercise with her neighbors.
Deborah hosted a yoga class for her neighbors on a Friday and enjoyed seeing everyone embrace and enjoy it.
Deborah finds teaching yoga calming and derives happiness from giving people peace and awareness.
Teaching yoga has helped Deborah make great friends and build community connections.
Jolene: Jolene is having a hard time dealing with her Engineering assignments and is struggling to keep up.
Jolene is interested in discussing time management with Deborah to help with her workload.
Jolene wants to find a time to chat with Deborah about time management.
Jolene values having support in tough times and finds it essential in handling life challenges.
